dear_world_message:
Dear World,
In the midst of chaos and uncertainty, let's remember the power of compassion, unity, and resilience. Together, we can overcome any challenge and build a future filled with hope, kindness, and possibility. Let's stand together, shoulder to shoulder, and create a world where everyone can thrive.
With love and solidarity, Earth

soloLevelGamePlayScreen.welcome_to_task_hub: Welcome to the Task Hub, aligned with the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals! Explore a spectrum of challenges crafted to address global issues like poverty, climate action, and equality. Each task is a step towards a brighter future for all. Let's unite our efforts and leave a lasting impact on the world.

leaderboard_screen.welcome_message: Welcome to the Leaderboard! Witness the triumphs of our Eco-Champions as their verified task videos light up the screen. Let their dedication inspire you to join the ranks of environmental warriors!
leaderboard_screen.dear_world_message:
Dear World,
In the midst of chaos and uncertainty, let's remember the power of compassion, unity, and resilience. Together, we can overcome any challenge and build a future filled with hope, kindness, and possibility. Let's stand together, shoulder to shoulder, and create a world where everyone can thrive.
With love and solidarity, Earth

badges_screen.congratulations_message: Congratulations! We've conquered the {formattedPlayerCurrentTier} badge! Now, let's ignite our determination and tackle more tasks to soar to even greater heights. Remember, every small action fuels our journey to success!
badges_screen.message_unlocked: Way to go! We've unlocked this badge, and we're just getting started. Let's keep the momentum going and conquer the next challenge together! ğŸ’ª
badges_screen.message_progress: Hey there! We're just {trophyDifference} trophies away from our goal. Let's crush it together! ğŸ’ª

task_submit_screen.ready_to_become_hero: Ready to become a sustainability hero? Share your completed task with the world! Simply paste the YouTube link of your accomplishment here. Once our team verifies it, your video will be proudly showcased on the Heroes tab, inspiring others to join our mission. Plus, claim your well-deserved rewards after verification. Your actions speak volumes â€“ let's make waves together!
task_submit_screen.enjoyed_task_recommendation: I thoroughly enjoyed this task and would highly recommend it to others! Let's inspire and motivate more people to join our cause!
task_submit_screen.confirm_submission: Are you sure you want to submit your completed task? Your contribution will help us in our mission to create a cleaner and greener world. Once submitted, your task will be reviewed for verification. Let's make a positive impact together!

mini_games_screen.welcome_message: Welcome to the Mini-Game Zone! Dive into fun-filled challenges designed to sharpen your eco-skills. Each game is a chance to learn, grow, and make a positive impact. Let's play and change the world, one game at a time!
mini_games_screen.coming_soon_details: Hey there, eco-champion! I've got thrilling news to share. We're gearing up to unleash a wave of new mini-games soon! Get ready to embark on exciting eco-adventures and expand your impact. Stay tuned for updates!

gotf_game.title: Guardian of the Forest
gotf_game.message: Welcome to GotF, where you become the guardian of the forest! Help protect our precious trees by guiding the axe safely through the forest, avoiding any contact that could harm them. Your skills will determine the fate of our green allies. Are you ready to embark on this noble quest?

light_saver_game.title: Light Saver: The Energy Guardian
light_saver_game.message: Welcome to Light Saver! Your mission is to switch off all the lights to conserve energy and protect the planet. Every light switched off is a step towards a greener future. Are you ready to illuminate the path to sustainability?

recycle_plastic_game.title: Recycle Plastic
recycle_plastic_game.description: Welcome to Plastic Patrol, where you embark on an eco-adventure to clean up the environment! Your mission is to collect and recycle as many plastic bottles as possible while dodging traps and outsmarting enemies. The fate of our planet rests in your hands. Are you up for the challenge?

donate_screen.message: Your generosity can change lives! Your donation will support our efforts to protect the environment and create a sustainable future for all. Thank you for being a part of this important mission.

toClaimReward.title: Thank you for making a difference!

alreadyCompletedTask.title: Hurrayyy..!!
alreadyCompletedTask.message: You have already completed this level!

underVerification.title: Under Review
underVerification.message: Your task is currently undergoing verification, a crucial step on our journey to change the world. Your commitment to making a difference is truly inspiring! Hang tight, and together, we'll soon celebrate another victory for our planet.

submittedTask.title: Hurrayyy!!
submittedTask.message:
You've Successfully submitted the task!
What next? wait for verification, and once done you can claim your rewards!!

logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to log out? Remember, every moment counts in our journey towards a sustainable future. Your contributions make a difference! Come back soon to continue making an impact.
